questions.text: Who starred in, wrote and produced "Reversal" about his own life?

Shaw.

questions.text: Was Leo Leone a defending state champion in the movie?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Thurman Ellis Jr. was a defending state champ that moved into the school district during the movie. Leo was the coach's son. Leo beat out Ellis for the spot on the team, then quit.

Justin Spates.

	Justin Spates was a two-time state champ in Pennsylvania (as a junior and senior), and a runner-up in Oklahoma (as a sophomore).  He also wrestled in college.
